application.doc: Stopping, starting, or restarting an instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

method.name: PUT
method.id: Start Stop Restart Reverse Proxy Instance
method.doc: To stop, start, or restart a selected instance with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the Reverse Proxy resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: operation
param.doc: A flag that indicates whether the operation required is to stop, start, or restart the instance. Valid values are "stop", "start", and "restart".

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
